General.Name: TAFI Industries Bhd
General.Description: TAFI Industries Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures, markets, trades in, distributes, and exports furniture products in Malaysia and internationally. It also engages in property development and investment, general contracting, and construction activities, as well as trades in glass; building materials; timber; household utensils; household fittings; electrical appliances; wiring and materials; wireless apparatus; solar panels; inverters; and solar related products. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Muar, Malaysia. TAFI Industries Berhad is a subsidiary of Armani Synergy Sdn. Bhd.
